detachmentRule.name: Rapid Takeover
detachmentRule.lore: Whether forming loose clans of wandering nomads or militarised rapid-reaction corps, the cultists of Outlander Claws use their experience to launch assaults on prominent targets. Swiftly exploiting or rigging them with proximity charges, they can deny resources to the enemy without yoking themselves to a static defence.
detachmentRule.description: Double the Objective Control characteristic of GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED and GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE models from your army. In addition, at the end of your Command phase, if one or more ATALAN JACKALS units from your army are within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

enhacements.name: Serpentine Tactics
enhacements.lore: With a chilling focus enabling them to identify ideal firing positions at a glance, this frontier assassin leads their brood in a coiling evasion from their enemies that suddenly changes into a lunging strike back.
enhacements.description: GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED model only. The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

enhacements.name: Cartographic DataLeech
enhacements.lore: This parasitic, cybernetic implant allows its host to tap into the survey augurs and proximity detectors of the cult's industrial transports. They use this leeched data to guide their comrades’ fire from vision slits and hatches, even at high speed.
enhacements.description: GENESTEALER CULTS model only. While the bearer is embarked within a TRANSPORT, each time that TRANSPORT is selected to shoot, until the end of the phase, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by that TRANSPORT as a result of the Firing Deck ability by 1.

enhacements.name: Starfall Shells
enhacements.lore: When they hit, these hand-crafted sniper bullets radiate with a supernatural aura redolent of the void’s numbing chill. Muscles seize, fingers cramp and thought slows as the sinister saturation takes effect.
enhacements.description: GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED model only. In your Shooting phase, after the bearer has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a cult sniper rifle. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

enhacements.name: Assault Commando
enhacements.lore: An expert in rapid attacks from speeding vehicles, this veteran has drilled their insurrectionist cell, readying them to leap into the fray with stolen weapons blazing.
enhacements.description: GENESTEALER CULTS model only. Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes a ranged attack, if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: along shadowed trails
stratagems.lore: With raw speed and subtle misdirection, Atalan Jackals outflank those who believe them trapped.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
stratagems.target: One ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effect: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9” horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of one or more battlefield edges. Until the end of the battle, you can only select ATALAN JACKALS units from your army to set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

stratagems.name: devoted crew
stratagems.lore: With evasive manoeuvres and split-second repairs, Outlander Claws marshal their rugged vehicles through the worst the foe can throw at them.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One GOLIATH ROCKGRINDER or GOLIATH TRUCK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: close-range shoot-out
stratagems.lore: A cult’s experienced outriders are experts in hit-and-run attacks and close-range firefights. These skills are deadly when combined.
stratagems.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED or GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability while targeting an enemy unit within 18".

stratagems.name: rapid feint
stratagems.lore: An Outlander Claw’s skilled riders and crews can use their enhanced hybrid reactions to rapidly alter speed and course, roaring after fleeing prey or luring enemy out of position and leaving them flat-footed.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ACHILLES RIDGERUNNERS or ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: deft manoeuvring
stratagems.lore: Serpent-fast, jinking and swerving with incredible skill, the cult’s light vehicles appear to slide through the oppressors' gunfire.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ACHILLES RIDGERUNNERS or ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: encircling the prey
stratagems.lore: Skirting the edge of battle, an Outlander Claw's raiders watch keenly for vulnerabilities, ready to throw themselves back into the fight to exploit any weaknesses in the enemy.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED or GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
